paper_abstract: Higman asked which block graphs of Steiner triple systems of order v satisfy the 4-vertex condition and left the cases v = 9, 13, 25 unsettled. We give a complete answer to this question by showing that the affine plane of order 3 and the binary projective spaces are the only such systems. The major part of the proof is to show that no block graph of a Steiner triple system of order 25 satisfies the 4-vertex condition.
paper_title: Steiner triple systems satisfying the 4-vertex condition
